chinese: 鲁博特姆立即四处游说。

english: Both the listeners began to attach an importance to her mediation .
chinese: 这两个人开始对她的游说重视起来。

english: This was altogether a splendid time for friendly persuasion .
chinese: 这全然是一个友好地进行游说的绝妙时刻。

english: He is going round firms drumming up interest in the project .
chinese: 他到各公司游说以引起大家对该项目的兴趣。

english: He had lobbied the treasury to provide more resources, but they had refused .
chinese: 他曾游说财政部增加经费，但他们拒绝了。
游说造句挺难的，這是一个万能造句的方法

english: Mr. slope will be accused of deceit in his mode of canvassing .
chinese: 人们会指控说，斯洛普先生在他的游说方式上犯有欺骗行为。

english: The company hired the president 's special trade representative to lobby mr. pierce .
chinese: 公司雇用了总统的特别商业顾问去游说皮埃斯先生。

english: Roscoe, this lobbying job of yours is as transparent as a fresh washed window .
chinese: 罗斯科，你这番游说活动的目的就象刚擦过的窗子，别人一眼可以看透。

english: Industrial country governments dispatched experts to promote the economic merits of nuclear power .
chinese: 工业化国家政府曾纷纷派出专家到处游说，宣传核电的经济效益。

english: They sometimes lobby to increase tariffs and to set quotas on imports of foreign-made substitutes .
chinese: 它们有时游说国会提高关税和对外国制造的同种产品设置进口限额。

english: Several influences, apparently independently, were lobbying against gilbey and for roger .
chinese: 若干种显然相互并无联系的势力，正在为反对吉尔贝和支持罗杰而进行游说活动。

english: It fact, lobbies may be both-vehicles for the representation of interests, and people with suitcases full of money .
chinese: 事实上，游说集团可能两者都是，既是代表利益集团的工具，又是手里提着装满了金钱的手提箱的人。

english: That wednesday a delegation of foreign ministers from saudi arabia, morocco, algeria, and kuwait visited washington to press the arab cause .
chinese: 那个星期三，由沙特阿拉伯、摩洛哥、阿尔及利亚和科威特四国外长组成的一个代表团前来华盛顿，为阿拉伯的事业进行游说。

english: And jack frye is out there iobbying everybody in town
chinese: 杰克弗赖也在帮他到处游说

english: The anti - nuclear lobby is / are becoming stronger
chinese: 向议员游说的反核群众声势渐强
